ECSchema.description: This is only a test. Never use me.

ECProperty.description: Defines how the ECClass is mapped to table(s). Values: OwnTable (default), TablePerHierarchy, ExistingTable, NotMapped
If MapStrategy is 'ExistingTable' provide the table name here. Must not be set in all other cases.
Optionally specify the name of custom 'primary key' column which must be of type Int64.
